contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|collaborator}} '''Collaborator''' or '''collaborators''' may refer to: * [[Collaboration]], working with others for a common goal * [[Collaborationism]], working with an enemy occupier against one's own country ==In media and entertainment== ===In books=== * [[Collaborator (novel)|''Collaborator'' (novel)]], an alternate history novel by Murray Davies * [[Collaborators (play)|''Collaborators'' (play)]], a 2011 British play * ''[[Collaboration: Japanese Agents and Local Elites in Wartime China]]'', a 2005 history book by Timothy Brook ===In film=== * [[Collaborator (film)|''Collaborator'' (film)]], a 2011 upcoming comedy-drama film written and directed by Martin Donovan ===In television=== * [[Collaborators (Battlestar Galactica)|"Collaborators" (''Battlestar Galactica'')]] * [[Collaborators (V TV series)|''Collaborators'' (V TV series)]] * "[[The Collaborator]]", a 1994 second-season episode of ''Star Trek: Deep Space Nine'' * [[The Collaborators (Mad Men)|"The Collaborators" (''Mad Men'')]], season 6/episode 3 of ''Mad Men'' * ''[[The Collaborators]]'', a Canadian police television drama ==See also== * [[Collaborative learning]] * [[Collaborative method]] {{disambiguation}}
